title1_text: We can be your agent in Singapore and bring your goods to every street in Singapore through our mobile shopping mall.
title1_text2: If you have a product to expand the market, welcome to contact us.
title2_text: Shipping and storing your goods at more efficiently and lower cost.
title2_text2: Deliver your goods on demand anytime, anywhere.
title2_text3: Dedicated storage space is also supported.
title3_text: Build your logistics team with Low-Cost.
title3_text2: Service is only available during the day (9am-9pm).
title4_text: Put your goods on our platforms('EBuy易购生鲜' and 'EBuyMart' for B2B and B2C respectively) to sale for grabing more customers and orders.
explore_text: Let's explore more possible ways of cooperation
